sentence: In trading on Thursday, shares of Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) crossed below their 200 day moving average of $53.37, changing hands as low as $53.17 per share.
Salesforce.com Inc shares are currently trading off about 2.9% on the day.

The chart below shows the one year performance of CRM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:

Looking at the chart above, CRM's low point in its 52 week range is $36.09 per share, with $67.00 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $54.15.
According to the ETF Finder at ETF Channel, CRM makes up 8.21% of the iShares North American Tech-Software ETF (Symbol: IGV) which is trading lower by about 0.8% on the day Thursday.
